Others: The match was called off without a ball being bowled because of rain. Both teams took a point each, as the USA progressed to the next round. The result also knocked Pakistan out of the tournament even before they could play their final game.
Others (continued): What a stunning achievement from the co-hosts! The USA finish their group phase with five points, coming second in Group A behind India. With this, they have also sealed qualification for the 2026 T20 World Cup.
